command.name: GetMessagesForService
command.script: select m.message_id, m.text, sm.order_idx from messages m , services_messages sm where sm.message_id = m.message_id and sm.service = '$service' and sm.exit_point= '$exit_point' and sm.input_channel= '$input_channel' and current_timestamp > sm.start_date and ( end_date is null or current_timestamp < end_date)
